name: historyGetAssertionHistoryCounterReport
description: Get the list of assertion counters and type history

startTime.description: The start time in datetime string format

endTime.description: The end time in datetime string format

granularity.description: The query granularity in time interval

limit.description: The maximum number (default to 500) of results to return in a single response.

fabric.description: Filter by the fabric UUID or name

device.description: Filter by the device MAC address or name

port.description: Filter by the port id or name

assertType.description: Filter by one or more assertion types.

counterType.description: Filter by one or more counter_type

name: authGetUsers
description: Get the list of users configuration information.

emails.description: Only return users with these emails, optional. If set, roles and enabled are ignored.

enabled.description: Only return users that are adminstratively enabled, otherwise include disabled users as well. The tenant and organization to which the users belong must be enabled regardless of the value of enabled.

roles.description: Only return users with specific roles.

includeMetadata.description: Include object metadata in the response.

name: authGetUser
description: Get a specific user configuration information.

includeMetadata.description: Include object metadata in the response.
